name: holochain-ui
description: A Holochain app (hApp) that you can add your own hApps to.

scripts.hc:build-vault: rm -rf tmp-storage && mkdir -p dna && cd dna-src/holo-vault && hc package --output ../../dna/holo-vault.hcpkg --strip-meta
scripts.hc:build-chat: rm -rf tmp-storage && mkdir -p dna && cd dna-src/holo-chat && hc package --output ../../dna/holo-chat.hcpkg --strip-meta
